group_1.textLeft: Ggh... Ugh... Uh...

group_1.textRight: *Pant...* *Pant...*@Let's end this already...
We Magical Girls deserve to be saved too.

group_1.textLeft: What is there to save...?!
The truth of Magical Girls refuses to be known.
Even when it does, we end up used and abused.
Being Magical Girls is enough to stress us to our@limits!
You think it will make people kind?@That's nothing but fantasy... We can't be kind!
I've witnessed countless deaths, met countless@ends at the hands of that fate!
I'm not gonna let some naive teenager@lecture me about her stupid ideals!

group_1.textRight: ...You... You aren't Mikoto right now, are you?

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm Mikoto Sena...
Mikoto...Sena...?
I joined with the Witch who had once lived as@Mikoto.
I...joined with...?

group_1.textRight: Who are you...?

group_1.textLeft: Who am I...? Before I was Mikoto, I was...
I was once a girl forced to fight in a war.
I was also once the daughter of a fallen noble.
I was also once a girl who lived in poverty,@a child suffering from starvation...
And now I am no one and everyone.

group_1.textRight: What made you despair...?

group_1.textLeft: I exhausted all of my magic.

group_1.textRight: So who was the real you,@from a long, long time ago...?

group_1.textLeft: The real me...was...
I couldn't save Tsuyu from becoming a Witch...
I couldn't slay the Witch of Symbols slumbering@beneath the castle...and so I became a Witch...
Ahh... No... No...!
Hey, help me! Help Tsuyu...!

group_1.narration: ―Chizuru―@No, there's no chance...@I couldn't ever be saved...
―Chizuru―@For countless centuries,@Magical Girls have been bound by sorrow...
―Chizuru―@The Mirror Witch has proven this legacy of sorrow,@stretching back to the dawn of time...
―Chizuru―@Her body, blackened with@sinister defilement...demonstrates it.
―Mikoto―@No Magical Girl@has ever been happy.
―Mikoto―@All of us must end in despair or death.@We have no choice but to end in sorrow.
―Chizuru―@Everything just prolongs my sorrow...@My consciousness knows only grief...
―Chizuru―@I can't save anyone, and I suffer over and over.@I don't want this endless sorrow anymore.
―Mikoto―@Aah, I don't want to go back to that house anymore...@Why do I have to be miserable?
―Iroha―@You ARE Mikoto Sena!
―Mikoto―@...!
―Iroha―@You're kind, Mikoto. So much so that all of these tragic histories@you've witnessed have clouded the shape of your very soul.
―Iroha―@You lament the misfortunes of Chizuru and the@other girls you've known as if they were your own.
―Iroha―@But you can't let them@overwrite who you are.
―Iroha―@These hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands of curses@and sorrows that you embody― I will rewrite their end.
―Iroha―@They will lead to a future of our making, one that will end in@joy and hope. We can believe in the tomorrows to come.
―Iroha―@So please,@let us end this battle...!
―Mikoto―@You want me to just ignore@all of that sorrow...?
―Iroha―@We won't ignore it! We don't deny it!@We will face it, accept it, and overcome it!
―Iroha―@In these few years we've existed, the Magical Girls@here have already created so much hope.
―Iroha―@Given hundreds of years, we may even be able@to reverse these sorrows you've accumulated.
―Chizuru―@If you really think you can save Tsuyu...@then prove it!
―Mikoto―@Yes.@Show us a miracle here and now.
―Mikoto―@I'll give you my power.@Show me how you'll save these Magical Girls!
―Iroha―@*Gasp*
I'm connected...@The Mirror Witch...poured all of her power into me...
I can... I see the past...@And what has happened in other worlds...
Following the traces of Magical Girls,@Mikoto and the others have seen nothing but sorrow.
She has borne the curse of hundreds...thousands...@of Magical Girls...
I see. I must carry this history,@and prove there is hope by illuminating our future.
To take this sadness away from Mikoto@and the others, to have them believe@we can stride into the future together...@I must first save everyone here and now.
What's more...

group_1.textCenter: They became afraid...before they became kind...
...Claiming that though Magical Girls may be great,@the weak ones are worthless.
I just wanted people to understand how@much suffering Magical Girls go through...
If this is how it's gonna be, things were@better off the way they were before!
Before, when we all had a better connection...

group_1.narration: These nightmares of our futures can be averted by@accepting the mistakes made over centuries past.
By knowing our history and keeping it alive,@we can reduce the number of Magical Girl@who are born by being hurt by others.
Then I'll—!

group_1.textCenter: *Gasp*
(There are so many pasts...but this one...)

group_1.narration: I see.@If it hadn't been for that one instant,@I would have died in a car accident.
I would never have become a Magical Girl,@and Ui, Touka, and Nemu...@would not have survived.

group_1.textCenter: (...There's still something I'm wondering about.)
(...I kicked it...)
(But...what...?)

group_1.narration: I kicked a pebble back then,@and that's why I'm here now...
In every other reality, I am dead.@This one, where one person's power to go@back in time unintentionally caused this change,@is the only reality in which@I have been allowed to live.
So...
One person's power to go back in time@led to my survival.@I became a Magical Girl with@the power of restoration.
I know how I can show Mikoto@and the others a miracle now.

group_1.textLeft: The Labyrinth... It's gone.

group_1.textRight: The Witches and Familiars have all vanished.

group_1.textLeft: Where'd all the other chicks go?!

group_1.textRight: I guess now that the mirrors are gone,@they're gone too...

group_1.textLeft: It didn't look like we beat her from what I saw...

group_1.textRight: Right...
It seemed more like it was absorbed and vanished...

group_1.textCenter: That's exactly it.
The Endless Mirrors...
Its accumulation of curses now swarms within me.

group_1.textRight: How can you possibly be alright...?

group_1.textLeft: Because Mikoto and the others are helping@me now, without struggling against me.
That's how I'm able to stay calm.

group_1.textRight: You managed to get that Witch of@all things onto your side too...?

group_1.textLeft: Not just yet.

group_1.textRight: Not yet...?

group_1.textLeft: I promised her that I would borrow her powers@in order to create a miracle.

group_1.textRight: Our survival alone should be a miracle enough.

group_1.textLeft: No...

group_1.narration: "My miracle to you will be transforming you all@from Uwasa into Magical Girls again."

group_1.textRight: Sorry, what? I mean, like,@we're plenty alive as we are now.

group_1.textLeft: ...But you can't go on like this.

group_1.textRight: She's right...
So long as you exist as just [textBlue:Rumors] of Magical Girls,
there is a limit to how long you can@maintain your human forms.
Even if we were to embody you like we did with@Sakurako,
providing that to everyone would necessitate@an untold amount of energy.
One mistake could make it impossible for you@to have a physical form altogether.

group_1.textLeft: Also, one of our major points is spreading the@truth of Magical Girls to the world.
It feels like a bit of a scam if we're not actually@Magical Girls ourselves, you know?

group_1.textCenter: Yeah. So in order to keep the future we want,
our only course is to expand the Automatic@Purification System,
and to turn everyone back into Magical Girls...

group_1.narration: "...by using my 'rewind' powers."

group_1.textRight: Huh?! You're planning to do that all yourself?!
Moreover, isn't healing supposed to be your@personal magic...?

group_1.textLeft: When I took in the Mirror Witch, I saw@various pasts and alternate worlds.
There, I witnessed the moment where my fate@diverged.
That's where I realized...
My power isn't actually healing. It's the ability@to turn back time for my target...
Those times when I healed everyone, and that@time I repaired Mifuyu's Soul Gem...
That power is what allowed those things to happen.

group_1.textRight: So the reason I retained my power even after@using all of the hope I had inherited...
And the reason my condition improved@and my lost magic returned...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, my power may have had an influence there.
Also, when you consider the leaf Kagome@made in the future,
it seems it was sent back to our time thanks to@my power.
It made it seem like the leaf had been created in@the past,
as if it had always been there from the start.

group_1.textRight: That's incredible...
If your power was able to do all of that,@then maybe it can also return us as we were...
Awesome! I'm gonna be a Magical Girl again in style!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, you understand perfectly.

group_1.textRight: ...But what about you, Iroha?
Even using Doppels has a price on our souls...
And that same power is at the very heart@of being a Magical Girl.
Handling all of that power over this staggering@number of people...I don't think that's safe.
Huh?! Are you serious...?!
I'm with her, Big Sis.

group_1.textLeft: I'll do it anyway.

group_1.textRight: But now that everyone has changed@from Magical Girls into Uwasa,
the very concept of their existence has changed.
Even if you successfully bring them all back...
Even if you have enough magic to pull it off... Even@if the Automatic Purification System still remains...
The very concept of your existence, stretched@to the limit as it is, might be lost altogether!
This is our Big Sister you're dealing with here, Touka.@I'm certain she's intimately aware of all of that.
And you're going to do it anyway, Sis.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
I worry that it'll affect you and Touka and Nemu,@too...

group_1.textRight: Cut the crap!@What about us being together from now on?!
This ain't a hopeful, happy ending!@It just makes me...sad...!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...
It's just one bit of sadness we have to give@in return for an abundance of miracles.

group_1.textRight: What're you talkin' about...?!
I'm glad we can keep everyone in Futatsugi City@safe, but...
Aren't you the one who dragged us into hope@to begin with?!
Don't you get it?! You're gonna leave@your group without a leader!

group_1.textLeft: If you do not create a miracle, this wicked@Devil of Mirrors will continue its course.
And so we must accept this miracle.
There are so many miracles I don't wish to accept,@but still they must exist...

group_1.narration: "When this all began,@when we first lost to the Mirror Witch,@all of you died.@You left the future to me."
"I decided, in that moment,@if sacrificing myself alone would@create a future for all of you,@I would accept that price without question."
"So even if I vanish,@please don't worry about me."
"The miracle I will perform will heal@the curse that infests the Mirror Witch@and save the future of Magical Girls."

group_1.textCenter: And so...I'm so sorry...

group_1.textRight: Really, now...
My watch finally began to move again thanks to you,@and now you're leaving...

group_1.textLeft: I really did want to be with you all.

group_1.textRight: I don't buy that you've truly given up on that.
As long as you remain in my memory,@you will always be with us.
Someday, we might even be able to see you with us@again.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: You're awful, Irorin.
You draw us all in and then throw us away.@It's not right playing with a girl's heart like that!

group_1.textLeft: Don't say it like that...

group_1.textRight: For real, though, have fun on your trip.
Just know that this cutie'll be doing as I please@with the Neo-Magius while you're away.

group_1.textLeft: Please take care of everyone.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you bet.
Frankly speaking, I don't understand what they@said about your concept being at its limit...
I just know that I'm upset with you.

group_1.textLeft: But you risked your life for our sake too, Shizuka...

group_1.textRight: Unlike me, if you were to disappear now,@far too many people would grieve your loss.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think that's true...

group_1.textRight: I really am angry at you.
But I will defend everyone until your return.
And I swear as clan head that I will become@someone as beloved as you are.
Hikaru spoke for me.

group_1.textLeft: I'm so sorry...

group_1.textRight: I'm certain every other group will give you ire,
so I'll just send you off with a smile.

group_1.textLeft: I don't know if I deserve that...@Do you really think...?

group_1.textRight: I do.
Your miracle will return us to being Magical Girls.@You're going to save us all.
...Tamaki.

group_1.textLeft: Yes?

group_1.textRight: I will await your return.
We fought to destroy Kamihama City.
You fought to save it, but now you'll be gone...
How are we supposed to replace you...?
It'll be quite the challenge...
Hence we'll need to make use of@what you're leaving for us.

group_1.textLeft: That's right. Thank you so much.

group_1.textRight: Before anything else, however, I expect we'll@need to tend to the girls of Mikazuki Villa.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry for causing you so much trouble.

group_1.textRight: No. You've given us more than we can ever repay.

group_1.textLeft: You didn't just save us just once, Iroha, but twice.

group_1.textRight: But even though you're doing this for us,@I don't know if we really can weave our future...

group_1.textCenter: Tsukasa...at the very least, we can weave a@connection between the East and West,
thanks to that student conference...

group_1.textRight: That's... Yeah... You're right.

group_1.textLeft: Iroha... I know my sentiment might@rub people the wrong way...
But I swear to build a future where@Magical Girls can grow up...
Where we can find joy as girls...and as women.
Iroha... Your voice...!

group_1.textCenter: Hey, wait... Iroha... Where'd you go?!

group_1.textLeft: I could've sworn she was just here...

group_1.textRight: Irohaaaa! Come back! Rena is worrying about you!

group_1.textLeft: I kind of am, though?!
I don't have that many friends I can talk to if you@go away!

group_1.textCenter: ...She really can't respond, huh?

group_1.textRight: Nnh... I remember when Iroha first came to@Kamihama City...
I think I was the very first person to talk to you!
That made me...really happy!
*Sniff...* Aaahhhh...

group_1.textCenter: She can't even speak anymore...

group_1.textRight: I hate this...
She disappeared before we could even talk to her...
Yachiyo, why aren't you saying anything?

group_1.textLeft: I'm going to look for Iroha tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: That's not fair! I'm going too!
Me too... I'll do anything to see her again!
Ui must be around here somewhere too...!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. With Mikazuki's bond,@I'm certain we'll find them again.

group_1.textCenter: Iroha!
We'll be here at Mikazuki Villa, and it will@always be a place we can return to.
I don't know where you are,@but you can come back to us anytime!
And even if you can't, I'll come and find you!

group_1.narration: ―Touka―@Welp, looks like you've gotten us caught up in this too.@No one can see us either!
―Iroha―@I'm sorry, you three...
―Ui―@*Giggle* You always apologize@whenever you get scolded, Sis.
―Iroha―@I just feel awful for@making everyone so sad.
―Iroha―@I wanted this miracle to@end things in joy and hope...
―Nemu―@There's only so much you can ask for.@I'm quite pleased with this outcome. *Giggle*
―Ui―@You seem really happy, Nemu.
―Nemu―@I feel like it's been quite some time since@it's just been the four of us, talking like this.
―Nemu―@Who would have guessed that our story would begin in@a hospital room and end in the expanse of the universe?
―Touka―@Imagine! We could start unlocking the mysteries of the universe@as we work on expanding the Automatic Purification System...
―Nemu―@You're insatiable, Touka.
―Touka―@Hey, you're supposed@to say I'm inquisitive!
―Ui―@It really is just like the old days, huh?
―Iroha―@Let's use this vast energy to spread the Automatic@Purification System throughout the world.
―Touka & Ui & Nemu―@Yes!
[textBlack:I hope this miracle I demonstrated@is enough to convince her.@The curse that had filled my being@is subsiding and melting away.]
[textBlack:With all of the curses and impurities@of the world being drawn away,@I'm sure many people will be saved going forward.]
We don't have to change everything right away.@It can be slow and gradual.
This will be our first step to changing@Magical Girls and people at large.@To create a kind world where@we can all dream of the future...
